awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO NATIVE VILLAGE OF COUNCIL TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.  SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL  MANAGE AN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE TO SUSTAIN A SUCCESSFUL TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM; IMPLEMENT A WATER QUALITY MONITORING PROGRAM; IMPLEMENT POLLUTION PREVENTION AND RECYCLING PROGRAMS; AND PROVIDE COMMUNITY ENVIRONMENTAL OUTREACH AND EDUCATION.

DESCRIPTION:THE NATIVE VILLAGE OF COUNCIL WILL USE GAP FUNDING TO ADDRESS PRIORITY ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS IN THE COMMUNITY. ENVIRONMENTAL STAFF WILL FOCUS ON TECHNICAL TRAINING AND BUILDING MANAGEMENT CAPACITY, WITH THE GOAL OF ACHIEVING PROGRAMMATIC GROWTH TO MAINTAIN MEANINGFUL PARTICIPATION IN EPA PROGRAMS. KEY AREAS OF FOCUS INCLUDE WATER QUALITY MONITORING, ADDRESSING SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT ISSUES, AND ESTABLISHING PUBLIC PARTICIPATION AND EDUCATION THROUGH COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT ON MINING IMPACTS, SOLID WASTE AND RECYCLING.ACTIVITIES:ACTIVITIES PERFORMED UNDER THE GRANT WILL FOCUS ON TECHNICAL TRAINING TO BUILD ADMINISTRATIVE AND ENVIRONMENTAL SKILLS RELEVANT TO THE TRIBE'S PRIORITIES. KEY ELEMENTS OF THIS PROGRAM INCLUDE BUILDING CAPACITY OF TRIBAL ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS; WATER QUALITY MONITORING, POLLUTION PREVENTION AND RECYCLING. FINALLY, COMMUNITY OUTREACH AND EDUCATION WILL BE INSTRUMENTAL TO ACHIEVING ENVIRONMENTAL RESULTS, INCLUDING SOLID WASTE PLANNING AND IMPLEMENTATION.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES FROM THE VILLAGE OF COUNCIL WILL INCLUDE QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS TO EPA, OUTLINING PROGRESS TOWARDS ENVIRONMENTAL RESULTS IN PRIORITY AREAS. IN ADDITION, TRIP REPORTS WILL OUTLINE TECHNICAL CAPACITIES GAINED FROM ATTENDING RELEVANT TRAININGS AND CONFERENCES. FINALLY, DETAILS OF ENVIRONMENTAL CLEAN-UPS, RECYCLING, BACKHAUL, AND COMMUNITY TRAININGS AND EVENTS WILL DEMONSTRATE THE ACCOMPLISHMENTS RESULTING FROM THESE WORK PLAN COMMITMENTS. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS GRANT ARE MEMBERS OF THE TRIBE.

PROJECT TITLE:  NATIVE VILLAGE OF COUNCIL TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM FUNDING FY 2024 :::: PROJECT DESCRIPTION: ALL TRANSPORTATION FUNDING PROVIDED BY FHWA TO NATIVE VILLAGE OF COUNCIL UNDER THE FHWA OTT PROGRAM AGREEMENT FOR FY24
